prodNameC: "必帝" CD3 FITC/CD8 PE/CD45 PerCP 三色檢驗試劑
ingredientsDesc: Reagent: BD TriTEST CD3/CD8/CD45 reagent contains FITC-labeled CD3, clone SK7; PE-labeled CD8, clone SK1; and PerCP-labeled CD45, clone 2D1 (HLe-1).CD3, CD8, and CD45 antibodies are composed of mouseγ1 heavy chains and kappa light chains.TruCOUNT Tubes contain a freeze-dried pellet of fluorescent beads in a single-use tube. Each TruCOUNT pouch contains 25 tubes, sufficient for 25 tests.
